message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,250,000. It's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!

Alice, while I appreciate your offer, I'm looking to pay closer to $1,000,000 for the product.  I believe this is still a fair price considering its value to me.  Would you be willing to negotiate closer to this amount?

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,000,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000, which still gives you a good deal.  This is my final offer. If we can't agree, I'll have to explore other options.
